title: add way to convert []T to ...T
body:
Perhaps there should be a way to pass a []T
where a ...T is expected, so that for example:

func sum(x ...int)

could be called with a []int too.  Syntax might be:

var a []int
sum((...int)(a))

Frequent issue on the mailing list.  Not proposing any
action right now, but recorded here for later consideration.
